home.mainText: Embrace the digital age, bring your business into the digital realm

about.mainText: Hi! I'm Alex, a web developer based in Poltava, Ukraine. I specialize in crafting websites of various complexities, ensuring seamless user experiences for businesses and individuals alike.

services.secondTitle: Building digital solutions, one website per problem.
services.title1: What I can do for you
services.text1: Tailored websites of various complexities, crafted just for you. Create faster, better products that resonate with your users.
services.text2: Every web developer needs the right tools to do their job perfectly. Fortunately, I have the main ones.
services.text3: Your website will be meticulously crafted, considering the distinctive features of your business
services.point1: Development of customized websites, taking into account all client needs.
services.point2: Ensuring fast loading and efficient website performance.
services.point3: Provide technical support, updates and regular maintenance of the website.
services.point6: Optimization and debugging tools - Chrome Developer Tools
services.point7: Website will be crafted considering the unique features of your business
services.point8: Website will be optimized for use on different devices
services.point9: I'll provide tech support and address any questions or needs

works.secondTitle: My portfolio includes a number of projects that clearly demonstrate my skills and experience in web development. Each project is accompanied by a brief description and a link to a live demo. This is an ideal way to get acquainted with my ability to solve various technical problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
works.descr1: StroySet is your reliable supplier of building materials throughout Ukraine. We offer a wide range of quality materials for construction.
works.descr2: QuestTasker - your personal assistant for task creation, note management, sorting, and document storage. A simple and effective way to organize your life.
works.descr3: Savor Slice Hub is your personal assistant in creating, organizing, and achieving tasks. A simple and effective way to organize your life with delicious pizzas!

skills.title: Skills & Expierience
skills.expText1: Started training at the end of 2021. In 2022, stubbornly learned the main technologies. Wrote more than 20 training projects and 3 commercial projects, which allowed in-depth study of technology, gaining the necessary experience to write projects. You can see them on my github account.
skills.expText2: As a result of the work, a functional application was created, which has a convenient and understandable interface. Thoughtful functionality will allow people to quickly order their favorite food. The admin panel will allow you to administer orders and manage products.
skills.expText3: The work was carried out in a team of two people (github). In the stack we used ReactJS, Redux Toolkit and TailwindCSS. To write the server I used NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB. As a result, a multifunctional website was written, as well as a secure admin panel for actions with goods and orders were developed.
skills.expText4: The main idea of ​​the project was to make people's lives easier and free up part of their memory by transferring it to a multifunctional notebook. As a result, users received a multifunctional program with which they can save their files, set and perform tasks, as well as record their brilliant ideas in the note manager.
